text:
Artemije Radosavljević (; 15 January 193521 November 2020) was a Serbian Orthodox bishop. He was the head of the Eparchy of Raška and Prizren from 1991 until 2010.
Bishop Artemije was born as Marko Radosavljević in the village of Lelić
Artemije died on 21 November 2020 from COVID-19 in Valjevo, Serbia at the age of 85.
